questions.title: What is the capital of France?
questions.description: The capital and most populous city of France.
questions.example: The answer is a well-known city that is often referred to as the "City of Light".

questions.title: What is the chemical symbol for water?
questions.description: The chemical formula for water consists of two elements.
questions.example: The symbol is H2O, representing two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.

questions.title: Who painted the Mona Lisa?
questions.description: This famous painting is one of the most recognized artworks in the world.
questions.example: The artist was a master during the Italian Renaissance period.

questions.title: What is the speed of light in a vacuum?
questions.description: The speed of light in a vacuum is a fundamental constant of nature.
questions.example: It is approximately 299,792 kilometers per second.
